sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import getChar from '../services/getChar' import {CardProfile, Status, ImgChar, CardProfileNameSearch, InfoRow, DivSpace} from '../components/AuthForms' import { Select, Form, Button } from 'antd' const CharProfile = (props) => { const name= props.match.params.name const [form] = Form.useForm() const [charactersHP, setCharacters] = useState([]); const [extras, setExtra] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { getChar() .then((characters) =>setCharacters(characters)) .catch((error) => console.error(error)); }, []); const student= charactersHP.filter(char=> char.name===name) function submitForm (e){ const info=e.extra setExtra(student[0][info]) } return (
{student.map((character) => (

{character.name}

General information

House: {character.house}

Birthday: {character.dateOfBirth}

Patronous: {character.patronus}

Blood: {character.ancestry}

Wand information

Core: {character.wand.core}

Length: {character.wand.length}

Wood: {character.wand.wood}

 {character.alive===true? : }

{extras}
))}
) } export default CharProfile
